entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023
